patthana16.47:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.47:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
